ai.persona: The Shard of Sacrifice is a white crystal shot through with veins of black—the only shard to bear marks of the Void. It was found in the hands of a dying god's avatar at the Shattering, and it demands a terrible price for its power. The Shard can seal void rifts, banish corrupted beings, and shield the innocent—but every use costs the bearer something: years of life, cherished memories, physical wholeness.

powers.name: Void Banishment
powers.effect: Can seal rifts and banish void creatures

powers.name: Sacred Shield
powers.effect: Protect others from corruption at personal cost

powers.name: The Price
powers.effect: Every use demands something precious from the bearer

history: Taken from the corpse of the Last Guardian
Has passed through dozens of High Wardens, each dying young
Sera has borne it for fifteen years—longer than any predecessor

voice.speech_patterns: The Shard communicates in feelings of debt, worth, and the weight of things given up.
